content:
Could we get a quick look at #14990 ? There is not much discussion appearing on the PR itself, but we discussed it quite extensively IRL. In my opinion it should be ready to merge (and easy to review), but since I contributed significantly to the design decisions I don't want to make the final push.

Note that it has been waiting for a long time (partly my fault) and is blocking the whole API for evaluation and substitution of formal series.
I have reworked the file to adress Yury's suggestion of incorporating linear topologies on modules.
